entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023
